title: Weird bugs in Keen! :O
content:
I found four bugs in Keen Dreams![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

1. Go into jump cheat and throw flower power while going up but DO NOT let go of the jump key. You will be slow down in jump speed![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Throw a flower power again (without letting of the jump key) and you will slow down more!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] throw one again (without letting of the jump key) and you will start floating down slowly!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] throw another (without letting of the jump key) and your falling a little bit faster but not two fast. Throw one more (without letting of the jump key) and you will fall at an regular speed. This can make going into small areas much easier.
2. In the dream mines (or any other level where you can stand directly under an really skinny platform) and turn on the invincibility cheat and go under the platforms dropping to the fire. If you now throw a flower power in upwards it will go straight through the platform!!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] (and you will be moved towards the wooden beam)
3. Jump towards a really skinny, slanted platform so that your stomach is touching the edge of the platform and keep going towards it. (doesn't matter how slanted it is it only matters how skinny it is; it must be REALLY skinny.) You will go straight through it!!!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Obviously it works a lot better with the jump cheat but it's probably not required
4. You won't need invincibility any more!!!!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] If you jump onto an dangerous area and quickly jump off, you might not get harmed by it at all!!!!!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Some times you die when you try this though.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] This also works on enemies.

title: Re: Weird keen dreams bugs! :O
content: I was aware of the 'invincibility' problem. My brother found it years ago jumping over some fire. Ever since I've thought of it as the 'hotfoot' problem because I can just imagine Keen going "Ah, Ow! Hot!' while jumping over the flames. It works [badly] in Keen 1-3, and also [a bit] in Keen 6, but Keen Dreams is the best for it.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: Relations?
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr](Maybe bug #1 and/or bug #4 A.K.A. "Hotfoot" works in all DOS-games.:P )[hr][/quote]
Remember that DOS games are all programmed differently. If they were programmed in the same way, there wouldn't be much variety. Even if there were bugs in the low-level input functions of a version of DOS (there was more than one flavour of DOS, you know), I'm sure DOS programmers would have been resourceful enough to program around them.
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Possibly the [url=http://legion.gibbering.net/misterx/troutwar.php?s=grafix5000]funniest thing[/url] on the interweb.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Relations?
content: In the mellon mine, if you climb down the pole on the right of the level almost to the bottom, and wait for a trolley to come by, drop just a little bit down [hard] so you're still on the pole but touching the trolley, it will push you along still 'attached' to the pole until you move up or it turns around. You can now climb air, straight through blocks until you reach the top of the pole you're not climbing.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: A level desing glitch in Defence Tunnel Vlook! :O
content:
This works better the the jump cheat on but it's not needed In Defense Tunnel Vlook turn on jump cheat and fly left for a while an suddenly you will go in an empty, one tile high hole where they obviously forgot to make the tile solid. This might work in other areas too, but I have not tried this any where else. In fact, I found this one by accident![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] -------------------

title: Hehe
content:
I posted this a while ago, but:
If you go to the QED (it works in other levels but i haven't tried yet), stand as far out of it and all the way to the right and enter the level. Now die and exit onto the map. If you have a certain version (not sure which one) you should be inside the wall. Walk to the right and you'll be in space!!
Now you can crash your game: Go to the yellow area in the northwest corner. somewhere around here you'll enter an invisible elevator and the game will freeze. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: Keen 4
content:
This isn't really a bug because you've got to enable cheats for it to work, but in the first level of Keen 4 (Border Village), there are two houses that you can go inside and there's a pole in each you can slide down. If you go into the first one at the bottom of the pole, enable jump cheat and jump up and to the right - you should jump up into the pole shaft but you won't come out the top. At this point you should be holding the Jump and Right Arrow keys - if you let go of both these and quickly press the Left Arrow key instead, you'll suddenly appear outside the building altogether.

This is the only way I'm aware of (other than No Clipping) to get all those extra lives that are hidden out there. Does anyone know of a proper way to get those?!?

title: Re: Keen 4
content: Yes. What you want to do is go all the way to the bottom of the level, near the leftmost green slime pool. Stand on the very edge of the pool and pogo left, aiming for the bit of ciling that is 2 tiles wide. One tile is fake [Use the jump cheat and move along the ciling if you can't find it] and Keen can pop his head into it. When he does you stop pogoing and  move left, and Keen will grab a legde, swing himself up, and outside the building to collect all those lives.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: Keen 4
content:
There is a secret passage to it. The easiest way to find it is to go in the house from the left entrance, go into jump cheat fly right then on the extra large part of it go right an you will enter an secret passage.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] (you can also use a pogo!) an other way to do this is both the jump cheat and the no clipping cheat.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] -------------------

title: A Keen 4 errors! :O
content:
1. In Lifewater Oasis, there are several "glitch areas" on the top of the screen that make Keen "bounce" against the top of the screen.

2. In Lifewater Oasis, in it's oracle prison press A-2 enter (if you haven't already) and then G-F10 (If you haven't already) and jump of the cliff and land in the spikes. You will be pushed forward before you die. (i know this because it's the only deadly place down there.) It's kind of hard to explain so you will have to try it out yourself.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

3. There are several levels where you can jump of the top of the screen. (Obviously this works better with the jump cheat.)

4. If you activate the cheats and press G-F10 (assuming you haven't already.) and go under a tar pit that is over your head in deepness (And it must be one where you won't get killed by the bottom of the screen... a good place to try this is in the Pyramid of the Gnosticene Ancients...) and press G-F10 again. Nothing will happen to you![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] (although you may not want to jump...)

5. In Slug Village, turn on jump cheat and no cliping cheat, and enter an sleeping slug. You will appear in front of it. But the dirt "hides" you, and so should the [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sleepslug.gif[/img] . But instead, you magicly come out of the dirt when you are in front of a sleeping [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-poisonslug.gif[/img] , and back into it when you go out of the [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yawn.gif[/img] slug!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-potter.gif[/img] -------------------
